<script language="Javascript">
function trimString (str) {
  while (str.charAt(0) == ' ')
    str = str.substring(1);
  while (str.charAt(str.length - 1) == ' ')
    str = str.substring(0, str.length - 1);
  return str;
}


function emailCheck(type) // not sure if anybody uses this, but just in case i'm leaving it functional
{
 var email = trimString(document.emailForm.emailAddress.value);

    if (!validEmail(email))
    {
        alert('Please enter a valid e-mail address.');
        return false;
    }
    if(type == 1)
    {
        document.emailForm.submit();
	}
}

function validEmail(email)
{
    var vAtSym    = email.indexOf('@')
    var vPeriod   = email.lastIndexOf('.')
    var vSpace    = email.indexOf(' ')
    var vLength   = email.length - 1   // Array is from 0 to length-1

    if (vAtSym < 1 ||                     // '@' cannot be in first position
       vPeriod <= vAtSym + 1 ||          // Must be atleast one valid char btwn '@' and '.'
       vPeriod == vLength  ||            // Must be atleast one valid char after '.'
       vSpace  != -1)                    // No empty spaces permitted
       {
        return false;
    }
    return true;
}





function showCustomPopUp(thisUrl,thisName,theseParams)
{
	remote = open(thisUrl, thisName, theseParams);
}


//	verisign POP-UP WINDOW
function popUp(url)
{
	sealWin=window.open(url,"win",'toolbar=0,location=0,directories=0,status=1,menubar=1,scrollbars=1,resizable=1,width=500,height=450');
	self.name = "mainWin";
}

function jump(url)
{
	if (url != "" && url != null)
	{
		self.location.href = url;
		}
}
</SCRIPT>

<script>
/*
The methods in this file are accessed by the Flash widget on load.
*/

// function to encode the cp parameter value
function urlencode(str) {
	 str = escape(str);
	 str = str = str.replace(/\./g,'%2E');
	 return str;
}

//function that sets all the parameters that are required by the flash widget in
// the format param1=value1&param2=value2 and so on.
//Currently used to pass the "cp" value.
function sendXtraFlashParam() {
	 
			return urlencode('cp=1760781');
			
}
</script>

<script language="Javascript">

	//update cart quantity javascript function
	function updateCartQty(quantity){
		 var quantity = quantity - 0;
		     var retVal = false;
		     	 if(quantity < 0){
			 	       alert("Please select a quantity");
				       		     	    retVal = false;
							    	   } else {
								     
										document.getElementById("cartQtyId").innerHTML = quantity;
															       	 retVal = true;
																 	}
																	 return retVal;
																	 }
																	 // Section Code for Mboxes
																	 var section = "";
</script>

																																																																																																														      					 <script type="text/javascript">
																																																																																																																			 	   //swf path, id, width, height, version, bgcolor
																																																																																																																				   	       	   var fo = new FlashObject("http://www.ralphlauren.com/graphics/media/polo/topnav_rugby.swf", "base", "75", "26", "6", "#FFFFFF");

																																																																																																																							    			     fo.addParam("wmode", "transparent");
																																																																																																																										     			    fo.addParam("allowScriptAccess", "always");
																																																																																																																													    				       //fo.addParam("redirectUrl", "/shop/noflash.jsp");
																																																																																																																																	       				      //GSI FlashVars
																																																																																																																																					      	      fo.addVariable("FlashStaticCont", "http://www.ralphlauren.com");
																																																																																																																																						      					  fo.addVariable("FlashDynamicCont", "http://www.ralphlauren.com");
																																																																																																																																											  				       fo.addVariable("FlashBulkCont", "http://www.ralphlauren.com");
																																																																																																																																															       				         fo.addVariable("df_lightbox_show", "df_lightbox_show");
																																																																																																																																																				 				      fo.write("flashcontent_Rugby_headNav");
																																																																																																																																																								        </script> 
																																																																																																																																																										   <!-- end Rugby headNav -->

<script>
function openCartFunction(pid,qty,prodCounter)
{
	document.orderForm.action.value = 'skuAddToCart';
	document.orderForm.async.value = 'true';
	document.orderForm.prod_0.value = pid;
	document.orderForm.qty_0.value = qty;
	document.orderForm.prodCounter.value = prodCounter;
	prodField = eval('document.orderForm.prod_0');
	if(prodField != null && prodField != '' && prodField.value != null && prodField.value != '')
	{
		prodSplit = prodField.value.split("|");
			  if(prodSplit[0] != null && prodSplit[0] != '' && prodSplit[1] != null && prodSplit[1] != '')
			  		  {
							loadNewCartProducts(prodSplit[0],prodSplit[1]);
								}
								}
									
										ajaxAddToCart(document.orderForm,'flashPage');
										
}

function openZoomPopup(pid,col,popuptab)
{
	remote=open("/contentPopup/index.jsp?productId="+pid+"&flashCol="+col+"&isFlash=true&"+popuptab,popuptab,"width=820,height=569,left=0,top=0,scrollbars=1");
}

function showZoomedCol(colorName,pid)
{
   
   flashProxy.call('showZoomedCol', escape(colorName),pid);
}

</script>

<INPUT type="hidden" NAME=prodCounter value="" >

<script>
function replaceProdLinkURL(linkObj,prodLinkId){
	 if(linkObj && linkObj.href && prodLinkId != '') {
	 	    //append the query string to the URL and open the link.
		    	     window.location.href = linkObj.href + prodLinkId;
  			     } else if(linkObj && linkObj.href) {
  			       //go to the base product URL
  			       	    window.location.href = linkObj.href; 
				    } else {
				      //do nothing
				      }
}
</script>







<!--You are running on secprd2_ws_52_3-->



<!--File inclusion for custom link tracking, PLEASE DO NOT REMOVE-->

<SCRIPT LANGUAGE="JavaScript">

	function omniCustomLink(linkName, genericName)
	{
        try{
		// USRedesign - function rewritten for HCode - Alternate prod view 
    		   s_gi('gsicrlusprdi2');
			s.pageName='';
        		s.linkType='o';// custom links - link type would be 'o'
    					  s.linkName=linkName;
						s.linkTrackVars="products,eVar47,events";
							s.linkTrackEvents="event44";
								s.products = 'null';
    									   // a new event to track all click events on product page
    									      s.events='event44';
										s.eVar47= genericName;
    											  s.tl(this,s.linkType,s.linkName);
        }
        catch(err){//do nothing
        }
	}


// Following is the new function, created for the ENGAGEMENT IMPRESSIONS.
   function omniEngagementImpressions(sizeEvar, sizeEvent)
   {   //alert("in the new function OmnitCusLink : ");

          try{
			        s.events=sizeEvar;
						        s.eVar47=sizeEvent; // swatch info to be reported
									       	      	     s.pev2='Custom Link';
														        s.tl(null, 'o', null);


																   	    }
																	            catch(err){//do nothing
																		            }
																			    
																			    }
																			    
//End of ENGAGEMENT IMPRESSIONS CODE



      function omniCustomSwatchLink(omniEvar34)
      {   
      	  // USRedesign - function rewritten for HCode - family page swatches "More colors" link
	     s_gi('gsicrlusprdi2');
		s.pageName='';
			s.linkType='o';// custom links - link type would be 'o'
					  s.linkName="SwatchClick";
						s.linkTrackVars="eVar34,events";
							// the event that will need to be associated with all the custom links.
							   s.linkTrackEvents="event1";
								// a new event to track all click events on product page
								   s.events='event1';
									s.eVar34=omniEvar34; // swatch info to be reported
											     s.tl(this,s.linkType,s.linkName);
												
												}


// USRedesign - function omniCustomLink_GCodeOriginal 						
   function omniCustomLink_GCodeOriginal(linkName, genericName)
   {
        try{
		// we need to track the custom links, so link type would be 'o'
    		   s_linkType='o';
			// so that reports know which link they are reporting
    			   s_linkName=linkName;
				// need to call this method of omniture.js so the above two lines are initialized
            s_lnk=s_co(this);
		// we will have sub-relation on products, eVar31
    		   s_linkTrackVars="s_products,s_eVar31,s_events";
			// the event that will need to be associated with all the custom links.
    			   s_linkTrackEvents="event1";
				// this should be same as that on teh product page
    				   s_products = 'null';
    				   	      // leave this blank, we don't want to override what's originally there on the page.
    					      	 s_pageName='';
							// a new event to track all click events on product page
    							   s_events='event1';
								// the commerce variable used
    								   s_eVar31=genericName;
									// the argument is the suite Id and is dynamically passed to this function defined in omniture.js
    									   s_gs('gsicrlusprdi2');
        }
        catch(err){//do nothing
        }
	}

// USRedesign - function omniCustomSwatchLink_GCodeOriginal 
   function omniCustomSwatchLink_GCodeOriginal(omniEvar34)
   {
	// we need to track the custom links, so link type would be 'o'
	   s_linkType='o';
		// so that reports know which link they are reporting
		   s_linkName="SwatchClick";
			// need to call this method of omniture.js so the above two lines are initialized
			   s_lnk=s_co(this);
				s_linkTrackVars="s_eVar34,s_events";
					// the event that will need to be associated with all the custom links.
					   s_linkTrackEvents="event1";
						// leave this blank, we don't want to override what's originally there on the page.
						   s_pageName='';
							// a new event to track all click events on product page
							   s_events='event1';
								// the commerce variable used
								   s_eVar34=omniEvar34;
									// the argument is the suite Id and is dynamically passed to this function defined in omniture.js
									   s_gs('gsicrlusprdi2');
									   }

</SCRIPT>

																																																																																																			      <script type="text/javascript">
																																																																																																			      	          //swf path, id, width, height, version, bgcolor
																																																																																																					  	      	  	 	 var fo10 = new FlashObject("http://www.ralphlauren.com/graphics/media/polo/gridAssetHolder.swf", "test1",240 , 240, "6", "#ffffff");

<script LANGUAGE="JavaScript">
function emailCheck1(type)
	 {
	 var EmailOk  = true
	 var Temp     = document.emailForm.emailAddress.value
	 var AtSym    = Temp.indexOf('@')
	 var Period   = Temp.lastIndexOf('.')
	 var Space    = Temp.indexOf(' ')
	 var Length   = Temp.length - 1   // Array is from 0 to length-1

	 if ((AtSym < 1) ||                     // '@' cannot be in first position
	     (Period <= AtSym+1) ||             // Must be atleast one valid char btwn '@' and '.'
	         (Period == Length ) ||             // Must be atleast one valid char after '.'
		     (Space  != -1))                    // No empty spaces permitted
		        {
			      EmailOk = false;
			            //window.document.emailImg.src = "http://www.ralphlauren.com/images/pixel.gif";
				    				     document.emailForm.emailAddress.className = "emailError";
								     					         document.emailForm.emailAddress.value = "E-Mail Address";
														       return false;
														          }
															   if(type == 1)
															   	   {
																    // set value to 1 for PMO 46654
																       document.emailForm.emailHiddenOmniture.value = "1";
																       						    document.emailForm.submit();
																						     //document.emailForm.emailAddress.value = "Thank You";
																						     					     }
																											      else
																											       {   // else condition for PMO 46654
																											       	      document.emailForm.emailHiddenOmniture.value = "1";
																												      						     //document.emailForm.emailAddress.value = "Thank You";
																																		     					     }
																																							     }
																																							     //remnants of old dhtml popnav
																																							     function prl_bnavOnload() {}
																																							     function prl_resizeWindow() {}
</script>

<script type="text/javascript">
var date = new Date();
date.setTime(date.getTime()+(24*60*60*1000*10000));
var expires = date.toGMTString();
var enableWishlist="";
var userId="";
var username="POLO";
var userValue=""+",";
var rewardsUserValue=""+",";
var flagPage="0";
if(enableWishlist ==1 && flagPage==1){
		  document.cookie = username+'_Wishlist_clearSaleing='+ userValue+userId +'; expires=' + expires + ';path=/';
}

var rewardsflagPage="0";
if(rewardsflagPage==1){
	document.cookie = 'AceRewards_clearSaleing='+ rewardsUserValue+userId +'; expires=' + expires + ';path=/';
}

</script>

<script language="JavaScript" type="text/javascript">
function storeSREDID() {
    var thirtyDays = (60*60*1000*24)*30;
    var vals = document.location.search;
    start = vals.indexOf("SREDID=");
    if (start != -1) {
        var end = vals.indexOf("&", start);
        if (end == -1){ end = vals.length }
        var date = new Date();date.setTime(date.getTime()+ thirtyDays);
        document.cookie= vals.substring(start,end) + "; expires=" + date.toGMTString() + "; path=/";
    }
}
function getSREDID(){
   var n = "SREDID=";
   var cookies = document.cookie;
   var start = cookies.indexOf(n);
   if (start == -1){ return null; }
   start += n.length ;
   var end = cookies.indexOf(";", start);
   if (end == -1){ end = cookies.length }
   return cookies.substring(start, end);
}
</script>

var gaJsHost = (("https:" == document.location.protocol) ? "https://ssl." : "http://www.");
document.write(unescape("%3Cscript src='" + gaJsHost + "google-analytics.com/ga.js' type='text/javascript'%3E%3C/script%3E"));
</script>
<script type="text/javascript">
try {
var pageTracker = _gat._getTracker("UA-8100973-1");
//var pageTracker = _gat._getTracker('UA-2068015-1');
var registered = true;
var skuAddedToCart = true;
var showCartView = true;



// for future use - successful searches



//Null Searches
if((document.location.href).indexOf("noResults") > -1){
						 pageTracker._trackEvent('Search', 'Product', 'Results', 0);
}

//Popular Refinement Attributes/Values


//Checkout Initiation



//Cart View
if(location.pathname == "/cart/index.jsp" && false){
		     if(showCartView){
			pageTracker._trackEvent('Shopping Cart', 'sc View');
			}
}
//Merchandising Category
if ((document.location.href).indexOf("home") > -1){
   pageTracker._setCustomVar(4, 'Category', "en_US:Home Page", 3);
}
else if ((document.location.href).indexOf("shop") > -1){
     pageTracker._setCustomVar(4, 'Category', "en_US:Category", 3);
}
else if ((document.location.href).indexOf("family") > -1){
     pageTracker._setCustomVar(4, 'Category', "en_US:Family", 3);
}
else if ((document.location.href).indexOf("fbn") > -1){
     pageTracker._setCustomVar(4, 'Category', "en_US:Parametric Refinement", 3);
}
else if ((document.location.href).indexOf("product") > -1){
     pageTracker._setCustomVar(4, 'Category', "en_US:Product Detail", 3);
}
else if ((document.location.href).indexOf("noResults") > -1){
     pageTracker._setCustomVar(4, 'Category', "en_US:Failed Search Results", 3);
}
else if ((document.location.href).indexOf("search") > -1 && (document.location.href).indexOf("fbn") == -1){
     pageTracker._setCustomVar(4, 'Category', "en_US:Successful Search Results", 3);
}
else if ((document.location.href).indexOf("cart") > -1){
     pageTracker._setCustomVar(4, 'Category', "en_US:Shopping Bag", 3);
}
else if ((document.location.href).indexOf("wlName") > -1){
     pageTracker._setCustomVar(4, 'Category', "en_US:Wishlist", 3);
}
else if ((document.location.href).indexOf("checkout") > -1 && (document.location.href).indexOf("flowExecutionKey") == -1 && false ){
     pageTracker._setCustomVar(4, 'Category', "en_US:Checkout: Final Purchase", 3);
}
else if ((document.location.href).indexOf("checkout") > -1 && (document.location.href).indexOf("flowExecutionKey") > -1){
     pageTracker._setCustomVar(4, 'Category', "en_US:Checkout", 3);
}
else if (false){
     pageTracker._setCustomVar(4, 'Category', "en_US:My Account", 3);
}
else if (false){
     pageTracker._setCustomVar(4, 'Category', "en_US:My Account", 3);
}
else if (false){
     pageTracker._setCustomVar(4, 'Category', "en_US:My Account", 3);
}
else if ((document.location.href).indexOf("helpdesk") > -1){
     pageTracker._setCustomVar(4, 'Category', "en_US:Help Desk", 3);
}
else{
	pageTracker._setCustomVar(4, 'Category', "en_US:Unhandled_Page", 3);
}


//Locale Country Selected


if((document.location.href).indexOf("home") > -1){
					    pageTracker._setCustomVar(5, 'Locale', 'U.S', 2); 
					    pageTracker._trackEvent('Visitor Actions', 'Locale Selected', 'U.S');
}

pageTracker._trackPageview();
} catch(err) {}
</script>

<script>
function selectParametricFilterValue(dropDown) {
    var selectedValue = dropDown[dropDown.selectedIndex].value;
    if (selectedValue > "") {
        window.location = selectedValue;
    }
}
</script>
